column4: bones, of the dead person which are to be immersed in the holy waters (of rivers etc.)
column7: The word is derived from ásthi, or most probably from its weak base asthàn-. Here -sth- > -st- and the most productive diminutive suffix -u is added.
Metaphorically it is also used with reference to human beings in the derogatory sense.
Metaphorically it is also used with reference to human beings in the derogatory sense.
